alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 1:25AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Fall River County through 215 AM MDT... At 125 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles east of Provo, or 9 miles south of Edgemont, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oelrichs, Provo, Ardmore and Rumford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
